FinalProject You are searching: Make Name CarData undo Make ID Model Name Model ID success Yes No abdul_car search Search For A Car Search for Soccer Items Search For Songster Search For Trivia Open Close Review Save Shopping Go To ToolBar OK First, writes the name of the car brand that you are looking for. Second, click on the search button to load the information about the car brand. Note: You can cancel downloading the information by clicking on Unload in the taskbar " You will have a list of the car make that belongs to the car brand that you decided. Third, lookup for the car that you are inserted in and then click and hold. Fourth, you will get and dialogue box, which contains the information about the car.
